attributes.action: Allowing the flying of English and British flags
attributes.additional_details: People of this country have fought and died for this country’s flags for generations, to have it treated so disgusting and disrespectful in Recent years is a direct abomination of watch these people have sacrificed them selves for
attributes.background:
We as a nation have the right to fly the flag of this great nation.Communities across the country have been coming together to raise the nation’s flag, bringing a diverse group of people together who are proud of their national flag
We want the government to stop tearing down/destroying the flags

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The flying of English and British flags is allowed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
